DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to measure whether high-density electroencephalography can improve the detection of electrophysiological signs of awareness compared to conventional electroencephalography in post-anoxic comatose patients
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Between High-density Electroencephalography and Conventional Electroencephalography for Comatose Patients
DOC.criteria: post anoxic coma over 18 years old agreement from families alive 4 days after the beginning of coma traumatic coma nontraumatic but not anoxic coma patients with severe comorbidity previous to coma refusal of families to participate to the study contraindication to a highdensity electroencephalography exam
